Summary During the past 8 years I have worked as an interaction / user experience designer (both freelance and employed) on different products and services, ranging from websites to applications. 
 
As an interaction designer / user experience designer my goal is to create human-computer interaction that 'actually works' and which creates new possibilities instead of new boundaries. Too often interfaces, computers and/or technology in general are too complicated to be actually useful. I believe a proper balance between graphical design, functional design and technical design will result in products and services that are transparent enough for the user to reach his goals and thus working towards a positive user experience, while keeping business goals in mind.  
 
Obviously this is only a condensed version of my vision, but if you agree with me and like to talk with me about this subject do not hesitate and drop me a line!
